title: I had a go at editing a 5v5 Lee Sin - 10 Man Battle Royal - with weird viewing angle edits

embed.description: It took me a fair while to create this, it turned out well! I hope you all enjoy my first LoL video! :D Remember to hit like if you enjoyed it! Songs used: 1: Warsongs-Flash Funk (Marshmello Remix) 2: Warsongs-PROJECT- Yi (Vicetone Remix)

body:
Hello everyone!

I've just created this video, its my first time ever using the weird camera angle view editor tool

Id love some comments on it!

Thanks

replies.body: I honestly stopped watching a minute and a half in, mostly because the camera has spent more time not accurately on the fight (and Lee Sin one for all is boring anyway.)
the beginning is a bit slow - but as it goes on it gets a lot better! {{summoner:6}}
